trans-unit.source: Updates the position, size, shape, content, and translucency of a layered window

seg-source.mrk: Updates the position, size, shape, content, and translucency of a layered window

target.mrk: Updates the position, size, shape, content, and translucency of a layered window

trans-unit.source: Parameters

seg-source.mrk: Parameters

target.mrk: Parameters

trans-unit.source: Handle to a layered window. A layered window is created by specifying $WS_EX_LAYERED when creating the window.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a layered window.
A layered window is created by specifying $WS_EX_LAYERED when creating the window.

target.mrk: Handle to a layered window.
A layered window is created by specifying $WS_EX_LAYERED when creating the window.

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context for the screen

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a device context for the screen

target.mrk: Handle to a device context for the screen

trans-unit.source: A $tagPOINT structure or a pointer to it that specifies the new screen position of the layered window.

seg-source.mrk: A $tagPOINT structure or a pointer to it that specifies the new screen position of the layered window.

target.mrk: A $tagPOINT structure or a pointer to it that specifies the new screen position of the layered window.

trans-unit.source: If the current position is not changing, this can be zero.

seg-source.mrk: If the current position is not changing, this can be zero.

target.mrk: If the current position is not changing, this can be zero.

trans-unit.source: A $tagSIZE structure or a pointer to it that specifies the new size of the layered window.

seg-source.mrk: A $tagSIZE structure or a pointer to it that specifies the new size of the layered window.

target.mrk: A $tagSIZE structure or a pointer to it that specifies the new size of the layered window.

trans-unit.source: If the size of the window is not changing, this can be 0.

seg-source.mrk: If the size of the window is not changing, this can be 0.

target.mrk: If the size of the window is not changing, this can be 0.

trans-unit.source: Handle to a device context for the surface that defines the layered window.

seg-source.mrk: Handle to a device context for the surface that defines the layered window.

target.mrk: Handle to a device context for the surface that defines the layered window.

trans-unit.source: This handle can be obtained by calling the _WinAPI_CreateCompatibleDC() function.

seg-source.mrk: This handle can be obtained by calling the _WinAPI_CreateCompatibleDC() function.

target.mrk: This handle can be obtained by calling the _WinAPI_CreateCompatibleDC() function.

trans-unit.source: A $tagPOINT structure or a pointer to it that specifies the location of the layer in the device context

seg-source.mrk: A $tagPOINT structure or a pointer to it that specifies the location of the layer in the device context

target.mrk: A $tagPOINT structure or a pointer to it that specifies the location of the layer in the device context

trans-unit.source: The color key to be used when composing the layered window

seg-source.mrk: The color key to be used when composing the layered window

target.mrk: The color key to be used when composing the layered window

trans-unit.source: A $tagBLENDFUNCTION structure or a pointer to it that specifies the transparency value to be used when composing the layered window.

seg-source.mrk: A $tagBLENDFUNCTION structure or a pointer to it that specifies the transparency value to be used when composing the layered window.

target.mrk: A $tagBLENDFUNCTION structure or a pointer to it that specifies the transparency value to be used when composing the layered window.

trans-unit.source: This parameter can be one of the following values.

seg-source.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values.

target.mrk: This parameter can be one of the following values.

trans-unit.source: $ULW_ALPHA - Use $tblend as the blend function

seg-source.mrk: $ULW_ALPHA - Use $tblend as the blend function

target.mrk: $ULW_ALPHA - Use $tblend as the blend function

trans-unit.source: $ULW_COLORKEY - Use $iRGB as the transparency color

seg-source.mrk: $ULW_COLORKEY - Use $iRGB as the transparency color

target.mrk: $ULW_COLORKEY - Use $iRGB as the transparency color

trans-unit.source: $ULW_OPAQUE - Draw an opaque layered window

seg-source.mrk: $ULW_OPAQUE - Draw an opaque layered window

target.mrk: $ULW_OPAQUE - Draw an opaque layered window

trans-unit.source: Return Value

seg-source.mrk: Return Value

target.mrk: Return Value

trans-unit.source: True

seg-source.mrk: True

target.mrk: True

trans-unit.source: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

seg-source.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information

target.mrk: False, call _WinAPI_GetLastError() to get extended error information
